Resolved Question Show me another » How to become a manager at mcdonals from a normal employe? i do everything, from cleaning mopping to registar, including grill, making burgers, fries, refilling, everything. 5 years ago Report Abuse by Pinbot Member since: 27 December 2007 Total points: 545 (Level 2) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Asker Do a good job and show an interest in being a manager. Talk to the owner, branch manager, or whomever makes decisions like that. Tell that person you want to be a manager. At the very least, it will show that you are dedicated to the store and you will get advice on what you can do to become a manager from the person who knows. Best outcome you will become a manager Source(s): Worked at fast food restaurant and saw someone who had only worked there for a couple months become a manager just by asking. 5 years ago Report Abuse Asker's Rating: Asker's Comment: close Action Bar: 0 stars - mark this as Interesting!
